name: Arctozolt
description: The Fossil Pokémon. The shaking of its freezing upper half is what generates its electricity. It has a hard time walking around.

abilities.name: Volt Absorb
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no damage from electricity or electric-type attacks. Instead, half of any electric damage done is absorbed, restoring the Pokémon's HP.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a melee attack, roll a d4. On a result of 4, the attacker takes an amount of electric damage equal to this Pokemon's proficiency bonus.

abilities.name: Slush Rush
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Hail damage, and its speed is doubled in arctic conditions, or during a hailstorm.
